description: 3M 4411+ High-Performance Sealing Tape is a strong, single-sided specialty tape with a flexible TPO carrier and pressure-sensitive acrylic adhesive. Linerless adhesive enables easy, low-waste application. The durable, abrasion-resistant carrier makes the tape weather-resistant and suitable for outdoor use. Features: thick acrylic sealing tape with TPO carrier; immediate adhesion to metals, plastics and many surfaces; instant sealing without cure; conforms to irregularities; durable, abrasion-resistant, weatherproof; linerless for clean processing; low odor. Applications: sealing screws, rivets, joints and edges; sealing seams and gaps on metal or plastic surfaces; moisture protection outdoors; used in automotive, machinery, construction and industrial installations.

name: 3M™ 5413, 15.9 mm x 33 m, 0.068 mm, Brown, High-temperature Polyimide Adhesive Tape
description: 3M™ 5413 high-temperature polyimide tape consists of a polyimide film with a silicone adhesive. This brown tape is approximately 68.58 µm thick and is suitable for masking PCBs during soldering and other high- and low-temperature applications (approximately -73 °C to 260 °C). The roll core is polyethylene instead of cardboard. The silicone adhesive reduces adhesive bleed so cleaning is often unnecessary and productivity is improved. The tape remains dimensionally stable at elevated temperatures and removes cleanly without adhesive residue. It can protect surfaces from chemicals and UV and is flame-retardant. Recommended applications include use in PCB soldering processes and other high- and low-temperature environments.
